arts.ttl: Heuer Fernandes saves penalty as Hamburg hold Union Berlin to goalless draw
arts.sum: Hamburg goalkeeper Daniel Heuer Fernandes saved a first-half penalty from Andrej Ilić to help the visiting 10 men pick up a valuable point away to Union Berlin. The turning point of the match came early when Andrej Ilić failed to convert from the penalty spot, with Hamburg's goalkeeper Daniel Heuer Fernandes making a crucial save to keep the scores level.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings | Union Berlin 0-0 Hamburger SV – Fan protests overshadow draw
arts.sum: Union Berlin welcomed Hamburger SV to Köpenick on Sunday night and served up a goalless draw, but the game will be remembered for fan protests off the pitch. Story of…

arts.ttl: Fan Protests capture attention as Union Berlin host Hamburger SV
arts.sum: Hamburger SV made the two hour journey east to Köpenick, Berlin on Sunday night as they faced Union Berlin for the first time in the Bundesliga in a late 19:30…
